src:
Ludnica u Bolonji: Pefi i Vims sprečili senzaciju rafalom trojki, Teo sa penala overio pobedu
Novi trijumf ekipe iz Bolonje i posle neizvesne završnice

06 Nov 2019

 
Kad Virtus igra, ludnica je zagarantovana! Sećamo se kako je Miloš Teodosić pre samo nedelju dana utišao Monako uz zvuk sirene, a sada je kapiten Srbije to učinio uz pomoć Stefana Markovića i Kajla Vimsa protiv tvrdoglavog Ulma! Bio je Virtus na pragu drugog poraza u grupi, ali je rafalnom paljbom sprečen takav scenario, uz mirnu Teodosićevu egzekuciju s penala. Na kraju 92:91 u korist domaćina.
Kakva je to utakmica bila! Ulm je strašno mučio domaćina i sa tri dalekometna hica u uvodnih četiri minuta poslednje četvrtine otišao na velikih 10 poena viška (77:67), ali je onda usledila potpuno luda serija Virtusa 12:2 posle koje je rezultat glasio 79:79 na tri minuta pre kraja. Važnu ulogu imao je Miloš Teodosić, ali je ključnih pet poena vezao upravo pomenuti Vims.
Raspucani Grant Džeret je uspeo da vrati trojku i vrati gostima vođstvo, posle čega ga je poklopio Marković s trećim pogotkom s distance. Posle razmene vatre u režiji Hekmana i Vimsa ponovo se na strelištu našao Marković koji je jođ jednom zablistao i doveo Virtus na poen viška pred poslednjih minut. Vims se nadovezao s novom trojkom za 90:86, ali se gosti nisu predavali. Kilijan Hejs je režirao dramu koju je s penala razrešio Teodosić.
Virtus je utakmicu završio s čak petoricom dvocifrenih košarkaša! Vims je predvodio listu strelaca s 16 poena, Teodosić je ubacio poen manje (4/13 iz igre, 3/10 za tri) i osam asistencija, dok je Marković imao 12 poena, sve sa distance (4/8 za tri)! Kod gostiju ubedljivo najbolji bio je Grent Džeret sa 20 poena (2/5 za tri), uz pet skokova i tri asistencije. Kilijan Hejs i Andreas Obst imali su po 13, a Patrik Hekman 12 poena.

EVROKUP - 6. kolo




GRUPA A



UtorakAndora - Monako 95:68/Hana 16 - Bakner 16/

Partizan - Venecija 69:83/Tomas 18 - Vot 27/

GRUPA D

text:
Madonna in Bologna: Pefi and Wims Prevent Sensation with Burst of Threes
A new triumph for the Bologna team even after the uncertain final

06 Nov 2019


When Virtus plays, the craze is guaranteed! We remember that just a week ago, Milos Teodosic silenced Monaco with the sound of a siren, and now the captain of Serbia did it with the help of Stefan Markovic and Kyle Wims against the stubborn Ulm! Virtus was on the verge of a second defeat in the group, but a burst of fire prevented such a scenario, with Teodosic's calm execution from the penalty spot. In the end 92:91 in favor of the hosts.
What a match that was! Ulm terribly tormented the home side and with three long-range shots in the opening four minutes of the last quarter went for a big 10 points of excess (77:67), but then followed by a completely crazy series Virtus 12: 2 after which the result was 79:79 for three minutes before the end. Milos Teodosic had an important role, but the key five points were tied by the aforementioned Wims.
A bursting Grant Jarrett managed to get the three back and give the guests the lead, followed by Markovic with a third goal from distance. After an exchange of fire, directed by Hekman and Wims, Markovic found himself on the range again, glistening once more and bringing Virtus to the point of last-minute surplus. Wims topped the new three with 90:86, but the guests did not surrender. Cillian Hayes directed the drama, which Teodosic dismissed from the penalty spot.
Virtus finished the game with as many as five double-digit basketball players! Wims led the list of scorers with 16 points, Teodosic scored one point less (4/13 from play, 3/10 for three) and eight assists, while Markovic had 12 points, all from distance (4/8 for three)! Grent Jerret scored 20 points (2/5 for three) with five rebounds and three assists. Killian Hayes and Andreas Obst had 13 each and Patrick Heckman had 12 points each.

EUROPE - Round 6




GROUP A



TuesdayAndora - Monaco 95: 68 / Hana 16 - Bakner 16 /

Wednesday

Promiteas - Maccabi Rishon 88: 77 / Beb 20 - Hamilton 20 /
Virtus - Ulm 92: 91 / Wims 16 - Jerret 20 /
